dcterms:creator: K. Drossos
S. Lipping
T. Virtanen
dcterms:description: Clotho-v2 was released for Task 6 of the DCASE 2021 Challenge, including 3839, 1045 and 1045 audio clips for the development, validation and evaluation splits, respectively. Each audio clip has five captions. The audio clips have a varying duration ranging from 15 to 30 seconds, with captions of 8 to 20 words.
dcterms:title: Clotho-v2

dcterms:creator: C. D. Kim
B. Kim
H. Lee
G. Kim
dcterms:description: AudioCaps is another AAC dataset whose audio signals are from AudioSet, including 44366, 458 and 905 audio clips for the development, validation and evaluation, respectively. Each audio clip has the duration of 10 seconds.
dcterms:title: AudioCaps
